li.label: Fast Cook
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to cook fast. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that the faster the food is done the faster the others get a full stomach.

li.label: Cleanly
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always hated the sight of filth. [PAWN_pronoun] will never bring in filth.

li.label: Messy
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has had a history playing in dirt and just cant kill the habit. [PAWN_pronoun] will bring in more filth.

li.label: Talkative
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to chat. [PAWN_pronoun] loves to chat up a storm and make friends social impact is 50% better.

li.label: Anti-Social
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Hates to chat. [PAWN_pronoun] Hates to chat and make friends social impact is -50% worse.

li.label: Slow Cook
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] hates to cook fast. [PAWN_pronoun] has always had a problem cooking slow and just cant kill the habit.

li.label: Naturally Happy
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is just naturally happy about [PAWN_possessive] life and everything, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

li.label: Shut in
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has always had a preference for indoors and tends to suffer from anxiety the moment they leave a building and sometimes confine themselves to wonder their own room when mental pressure gets too high.

li.label: Nomadic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes the idea of moving homes periodically if things get too stressing, keep them sane or they might leave you.

li.label: Enhanced
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has developed a lasting strong body from living in very dangerous environment. [PAWN_pronoun] MaxHitPoints is better then normal.

li.label: Pack Mule
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned through hard labor that carrying more helps alot, they have learned that carrying is very important for the colony. [PAWN_pronoun] CarryingCapacity is higher then normal.

li.label: Lazy Labor
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has never enjoyed carrying alot of weight and becomes a slight burden to the rest of the colony, they have learned that carrying is very tiresome. [PAWN_pronoun] CarryingCapacity is Lower then normal.

li.label: Weak-Mind
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s will is easily broken. [PAWN_pronoun] cant keep his mind straight, when others can.

li.label: master shooter
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots way less often than others, but never misses.

li.label: Thin Skin
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Takes more damage then normal due to his thin skin. [PAWN_pronoun] takes more damage then normal from all sources up to 20% more damage with less hitpoints then normal.

li.label: Trap-Awareness
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a 0% chance to trigger a trap. [PAWN_pronoun] has always had a sense of finding trap locations really easily.

li.label: Terrible Fighter
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been scared to fight and because of this they take much longer to throw a attack. [PAWN_pronoun] will take longer to throw a attack wether its melee or with guns by 50%.

li.label: Bad Dodger
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been bad at dodging.

li.label: Forager
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always foraged for food. [PAWN_pronoun] forages for food while traveling in a caravan.

li.label: GunNut
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always enjoyed everything gun related. [PAWN_pronoun] they are great with a gun but not so much in melee.

li.label: Gunner
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has always enjoyed guns even as a kid. has a habit to spray and pray.

li.label: Natural Counter
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been very good at melee counter attacking. [PAWN_pronoun] 50% more likely to dodge a attack and 20% more likely to hit a attack.

li.label: Irresistible
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is Irresistible. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.

li.label: Deathly ill
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has almost no immune system and high grade medicine may be needed. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain way less immunity, in the case of a infection amputation may be needed.

li.label: Pain Sensitive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a intense sensitivity to pain and can enter shock easily. [PAWN_pronoun] will be downed by pain much easier then normal.

li.label: Pain Immunity
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a Immunity to pain. [PAWN_pronoun] will never be downed by pain.

li.label: Toxic Sensitive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a really bad weakness to toxic buildup. [PAWN_pronoun] stay away from toxic creatures.

li.label: Toxic Strong
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a really good immune system to toxic buildup. [PAWN_pronoun] performs well against toxins.

li.label: Toxic Deadly
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has no immunity to toxic buildup. [PAWN_pronoun] stay away from toxic creatures.

li.label: Toxic Immunity
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has developed a immunity to toxic buildup. [PAWN_pronoun] is the best to use to fight against toxins.

li.label: Heat-Insulation
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has heat insulated skin. [PAWN_pronoun] is well in cold environments.

li.label: Cold-Insulation
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has cold insulated skin. [PAWN_pronoun] is well in hot environments.

li.label: nano-immune
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a genetically powerful nano bot immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will never need tending to any illness.

li.label: nano-worker
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has genetically powerful nano bots running throughout their body. [PAWN_pronoun] will be extremely efficient at working.

li.label: Unbreakable
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned the strongest thing in any moment is a well placed mind.

li.label: Juggernaut
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been born with a unnatural talent towards defense bones are very dense making them as hard as concrete but it hinders the movement so doing damage is very hard. [PAWN_pronoun] will make a great frontline to hold off enemys.

li.label: Super-Human
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been a fan of superhero movies for so long. [PAWN_pronoun] injected their body with nano-bots that gave them superhuman abilitys.

li.label: Nano-Mind
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is filled with nano brain cells allowing his mind to learn and do things on a super-human level.

li.label: Super Cook
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a abnormally fast technique of cooking. [PAWN_pronoun] cooks so fast people say its like watching a god.

li.label: Nano-Happy
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was experimented on from a early age to help test new forms of nano-bot usage and because of this a new nano-bot tested on them lead to inducing a permanent large dopamine production in the brain causing [PAWN_nameDef] to keep smiling and happy no matter what happens to them.

li.label: Super Doctor
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a medical skills that are on a super human level, there is no patient that [PAWN_pronoun] couldn't save.

li.label: Super Tamer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a strange super human ability that allows them to bond and connect to almost any animal they encounter.

li.label: HyperActive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always had a hyper mind making them run all around - its not good for their mental health.

li.label: Relaxed
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been very relaxed even in tough situations.

li.label: Reckless
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] thinks they're much more skilled and clever than they really are and expects everything to be easy. They rush into things and don't listen to advice or warnings. Very fast building, cooking and farming, but with a high chance of failing and wasting/destroying materials/crops. Levels up all skills more slowly.

li.label: Drug Dealer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has had a extreme interest in drugs. [PAWN_pronoun] will be faster at harvesting plants by 10% and get a 10% better yield from drug crops and cooks drugs faster.

li.label: Green Thumb
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely good at Farming and will finish Harvesting faster at 50% and Collects more than most at 20%.

li.label: Red Thumb
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely bad at Farming and will finish Harvesting slower at -50% and Collects less than most at -20%.

li.label: Abundent Harvest
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned through hardwork and patience rewards them greatly. [PAWN_pronoun] will be 50% slower plant speed and a 60% greater crop yield.

li.label: Natural Builder
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural Builder and will finish Repairing/Building faster than most and has a 20% chance not to botch.

li.label: Terrible Builder
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Terrible Builder and will finish Repairing/Building slower than most and has 20% more of a chance to botch.

li.label: Good Warden
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely good at recruiting prisoners and will have a higher arrest chance then normal at 30%.

li.label: Intimidating
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has became intimidating to look at and can even scare the most friendly of pawns.

li.label: Bad Warden
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely bad at recruiting prisoners and will have a lower arrest chance then normal at -20%.

li.label: Scholar
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always enjoyed learning new things. [PAWN_pronoun] can learn rather quickly.

li.label: Researcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely good at research and will finish Researching faster than most.

li.label: Terrible Researcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely bad at research and will finish Researching slower than most.

li.label: Good Miner
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely Good at Mining and will have a higher mine speed then normal at 30% and a 20% better yield.

li.label: Abundant Excavation
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned that being patient pays off.

li.label: Efficiently Brawny
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always had a reputation for being more muscle than brain, and as a result they can Efficiently do work way faster and easier aswell as take a hit then a normal person but lack any control over their emotions, causing them to throw a tantrum randomly.

li.label: Bad Miner
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely Bad at Mining and will have a Lower mine speed then normal at -30% and a -20% worse yield.

li.label: Good Surgeon
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely Good at surgery and will have a faster surgery speed then normal at 30% and a better surgery success chance at 20%.

li.label: Natural Doctor
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always enjoyed saving people, Tend Speed And Quality is better then normal.

li.label: Terrible Doctor
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always failed saving people. [PAWN_pronoun] Tend Speed And Quality is worse then normal.

li.label: Bad Surgeon
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely Bad at surgery and will have a slower surgery speed then normal at -30% and a worse surgery success chance at -20%.

li.label: Nervous Surgeon
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely nervous about their operations and normally is in a hurry and rushes the delicate matter.

li.label: Good Merchant
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely good at trading and will get better prices or sell for more at 30%.

li.label: Bad Merchant
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely bad at trading and will get worse prices or sell for less at 20%.

li.label: Good Crafter
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is faster at crafting. [PAWN_pronoun] takes less time crafting.

li.label: Bad Crafter
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is slower at crafting. [PAWN_pronoun] takes more time crafting.

li.label: Good Tamer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely Good at Taming and will have a higher chance then normal at 20%.

li.label: Bad Tamer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely Bad at Taming and will have a lower chance then normal at 25%.

li.label: Fast Eater
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has learned that eating quickly saves time to do more work. [PAWN_pronoun] eats faster then normal.

li.label: Glutton
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has developed a atrocious appitite. [PAWN_pronoun] hunger rate is higher then normal.

li.label: Preserver
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has developed less of a appitite, they have learned that preserving food helps the colony. [PAWN_pronoun] hunger rate is lower then normal.

li.label: Slow Eater
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always ate slowly to saviour the flavor because they never know when they might die. [PAWN_pronoun] eats slower then normal.

li.label: Hunter
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely Good at hunting and will have a Lower chance to not be attacked back then normal at 50%.

li.label: Bad Hunter
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is extremely Bad at hunting and will have a Higher chance to be attacked back then normal up to 50%.

li.label: Good Butcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to butcher food for the colony. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that somebody has to get they're hands dirty to feed everyone Butcher Speed is 30% and butcher efficiency is 20% better.

li.label: Bad Butcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isnt that good at butchering food for the colony. Butcher speed is -30% and butcher efficiency is -20% and a much higher chance to make food poisoning
